title: can't trasnfer from eune ?
body: i have an old eune account i used to use while around that part off the world i wanted to transfer i to oce but i can't see the option do i have to trasnfer na then oce ?

replies.body: Can you confirm or deny if you're able to transfer now, the option should be available now.
still unable but i put in a ticket  after the post i got  reply asking for a screen shot for some reason, but yea still waiting on another reply
Looks like I can't transfer my old BR account to OCE either, the option isn't even there... will it come back riot?

Hey there,

This is more than likely due to differing patch versions between regions, usually this is resolved within a few days.
I'd say take another look again on Friday, if it remains an issue I'll shoot a message off to the appropriate peeps to look into it.

Hope this helps,
Seph

Hello,

That's odd you should be able to transfer freely between Riot's region. Do not transfer to NA from EUNE to get to OCE; it will a lot more. I would say try re-login and I'll have a little dig around the net for you.

Good Luck,
PRIMAL
